entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing late this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 6:40 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
